TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 75
TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Alcalde of San Felipe, 07-23-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Political Chief [Ramon Musquiz] to Alcalde of San Felipe, July 23, 1828. Instructing him to honor Austin's demand for a force of militia to carry out a commission of the Supreme Government. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 75

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Political Chief [Ramon Musquiz] to Alcalde of San Felipe, July 23, 1828. Instructing him to honor Austin's demand for a force of militia to carry out a commission of the Supreme Government. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="07-23-1828">July 23, 1828*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
